Let my soul live, and it shall praise You; And let Your judgments help me. I have gone astray like a lost sheep; Seek Your servant, for I do not forget Your commandments. Alleluia. (Ps.Â 119:175-176)

The heaven of heavens is the Lordâ€™s; But the earth He has given to the children of men. The dead do not praise the Lord, nor any who go down into Hades. But we, the living, will bless You Lord from this time forth and forevermore. Alleluia. (Ps.Â 115:16-18)
